title: New: James Blake – Digital Lion (Ft. Brian Eno)
body:
Buzz tracks are like busses, you wait for one and….

.anyway. **James Blake** has dropped the 3rd leak from his new record after the radio rip of _Voyeur_ that went live yesterday. This sports a featuring credit from **Brian Eno** no less. It’s certainly less ‘live ready’ than something like _Retrograde_, however it has a similarly damaged quality to his first single, that hopefully will lead to an album that’s as tonally consistent as his self-titled debut.
